remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated EICAS message is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard L RECIR FAN light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

maintenance.para: Perform the following procedure to verify EICAS advisory message L RECIRC FAN is operative:

numlitem.para: Turn Recirculation Fan switch to ON.
Open circuit breaker L RECIRC FAN on the P31 panel.
If EICAS advisory message L RECIRC FAN is displayed, the message is operative.
Close circuit breaker L RECIRC FAN on the P31 panel.
